pageContext.claim: “You know how many cases I've lost and then we win? Okay, remember they said I lost ban -- the travel ban? And then they said I lost it again, and then I ended up winning it. So, I've -- I've had a great -- I've had a great track record.”
pageContext.analysis: This is misleading, though Trump generally does have a more favorable record in the Supreme Court than in lower courts. Trump twice modified the list of countries subject to his travel ban. The ban at first covered seven predominantly Muslim countries, but in the end, the ban that was upheld by the courts covered a mix of majority-Muslim countries and other countries.
